oai_dc:dc.dc:title: La formulacion de recomendaciones a partir de datos agronomicos: Un manual metodologico de evaluacion economica
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Production controls
Methods
Prices
Statistical analysis
Diagnosis
Input output analysis
Planning
Experiments
Crop yield
Surveys
Innovation adoption
Data analysis
Cost benefit analysis
Risk
Farming systems
Economic analysis
Marginal analysis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This manual presents a set of procedures for doing an economic analysis of on-farm agronomic experiments wich will help in selecting treatments for furter experimentation and for developing farmer recommendations. The following points are discussed: importance of reviewing the objectives of the experiment; the experimental design and management; how to calculate total costs that vary, average yields, adjusted yield, gross field benefits, and net benefits; how to develop a partial budget; the importance of dominance analysis, marginal analysis, minimum returns analysis, and sensitivity analysis; and how to draw and report appropriate
